name: OWS! Open World Space!
description:
OWS or "Open World Space" is a metroidvania with an artstyle based off of the NES classic "Gradius"

Yes, this game is my GBJAM5 entry and really enjoyed making this!

Pallete: http://imgur.com/a/q8I4a////// INSTRUCTIONS/////////////////

Keyboard Controls:
W = Move Up
A = Move Left
S = Move Down
D = Move Right

Space = Shoot
Z = Switch Weapon
Enter = Pause/ Map

Xbox Controls:
D-Pad = Move
'A' = Shoot
'X' = Switch Weapon
Menu = Pause/ Map
